sentences.sentence: This section houses the Complete Transformer Substations (CTS).
Three more power stations and two substations have been knocked out in Shaanxi province to the north of Sichuan.
sentences.translation: 四川省北面的陕西省也有三家发电站和两家变电站遭到破坏。

sentences.sentence: LTWP also has to construct a 266-mile transmission line and several substations to connect the windfarm to the national grid.
sentences.translation: LTWP还必须建造一条266英里长的输电线路和几个变电站，用以连通风力发电厂和国家电网。
